title: Calculate Quarterly Estimated Tax Payment
description: A self-employed consultant needs to calculate their quarterly estimated tax payment.

tasks.description: Project the consultant's total annual self-employment income and expenses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a projection of annual net profit.

tasks.description: Calculate the total projected income and self-employment tax for the year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent estimates the total tax liability.

tasks.description: Divide the total estimated tax by four and prepare a payment voucher for the current quarter.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the required quarterly payment and prepares Form 1040-ES.
